Token.Abstract: MobileAppTracker provides the methods to send events and actions to the HasOffers servers.
A singleton of the MobileAppTracker class
Starts Mobile App Tracker with MAT Advertiser Id and MAT Conversion Key. Both values are required.

Parameter.Name: aid
Parameter.Abstract: the MAT Advertiser Id provided in Mobile App Tracking.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: the MAT Conversion Key provided in Mobile App Tracking.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if error occurs, NO otherwise.

Token.Abstract: MobileAppTrackerDelegate : A Delegate used by MobileAppTracker to callback. Set this to receive success and failure callbacks from the MAT SDK.
MobileAppTrackerDelegate : A Delegate used by MobileAppTracker to callback. Set this to receive success and failure callbacks from the MAT SDK.
MobileAppTrackerDelegate : A Delegate used by MobileAppTracker to callback. Set this to receive success and failure callbacks from the MAT SDK.
Provides a view of the parameters used by the sdk at any time.
Provides a view of the parameters used by the sdk at any time.
Provides a view of the parameters used by the sdk at any time.
Specifies that the server responses should include debug information.

Parameter.Name: yesorno
Parameter.Abstract: defaults to NO.

Token.Abstract: Set to YES to allow duplicate requests to be registered with the MAT server.

Parameter.Name: yesorno
Parameter.Abstract: defaults to NO.

Token.Abstract: Set the Apple Advertising Identifier available in iOS 6.

Parameter.Name: appleAdvertisingIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: - Apple Advertising Identifier

Token.Abstract: Set the Apple Vendor Identifier available in iOS 6.

Parameter.Name: appleVendorIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: - Apple Vendor Identifier

Token.Abstract: Sets the currency code. Default: USD

Parameter.Name: currencyCode
Parameter.Abstract: The string name for the currency code.

Token.Abstract: Sets the jailbroken device flag.

Parameter.Name: yesorno
Parameter.Abstract: The jailbroken device flag.

Token.Abstract: Sets the MAT advertiser id.

Parameter.Name: advertiserId
Parameter.Abstract: The string id for the MAT advertiser id.

Token.Abstract: Sets the MAT conversion key.

Parameter.Name: conversionKey
Parameter.Abstract: The string value for the MAT conversion key.

Token.Abstract: Sets the package name (bundle_id). Defaults to the Bundle Id of the app that is running the sdk.

Parameter.Name: packageName
Parameter.Abstract: The string name for the package.

Token.Abstract: Specifies if the sdk should auto detect if the iOS device is jailbroken. YES/NO

Parameter.Name: yesorno
Parameter.Abstract: YES will detect if the device is jailbroken, defaults to YES.

Token.Abstract: Specifies if the sdk should pull the Apple Advertising Identifier from the device. YES/NO

Parameter.Name: yesorno
Parameter.Abstract: YES will set the Apple Advertising Identifier, defaults to NO.

Token.Abstract: Specifies if the sdk should pull the Apple Vendor Identifier from the device. YES/NO

Parameter.Name: yesorno
Parameter.Abstract: YES will set the Apple Vendor Identifier, defaults to NO.

Token.Abstract: Sets the MAC address.

Parameter.Name: macAddress
Parameter.Abstract: mac address, defaults to nil.

Token.Abstract: Sets the ODIN-1.

Parameter.Name: odin1
Parameter.Abstract: ODIN-1, defaults to nil.

Token.Abstract: Sets the OpenUDID.

Parameter.Name: openUDID
Parameter.Abstract: OpenUDID, defaults to nil.

Token.Abstract: Sets the site id.

Parameter.Name: siteId
Parameter.Abstract: The string id for the site id.

Token.Abstract: Set the Trusted Preference Identifier (TPID).

Parameter.Name: trusteTPID
Parameter.Abstract: - Trusted Preference Identifier (TPID)

Token.Abstract: Sets the user id.

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The string name for the user id.

Token.Abstract: Sets the UIID. UIID is replacement of the deprecated UDID in iOS for Asia and Japan. Ref: https://github.com/akisute/UIApplication-UIID

Parameter.Name: uiid
Parameter.Abstract: UIID, defaults to nil.

Token.Abstract: Sets the user's age.

Parameter.Name: userAge
Parameter.Abstract: user's age

Token.Abstract: Sets the user's gender.

Parameter.Name: userGender
Parameter.Abstract: user's gender, possible values MATGENDERMALE (0), MATGENDERFEMALE (1).

Token.Abstract: Sets the user's location.

Parameter.Name: latitude
Parameter.Abstract: user's latitude

Parameter.Name: longitude
Parameter.Abstract: user's longitude

Token.Abstract: Sets the user's location including altitude.

Parameter.Name: latitude
Parameter.Abstract: user's latitude

Parameter.Name: longitude
Parameter.Abstract: user's longitude

Parameter.Name: altitude
Parameter.Abstract: user's altitude

Token.Abstract: Set app-level ad-tracking. YES/NO

Parameter.Name: enable
Parameter.Abstract: YES means opt-in, NO means opt-out.

Token.Abstract: Record an Install or an Update by determining if a previous version of this app is already installed on the user's device. To be used if this is the first version of the app or the previous version also included MAT sdk. To be called when an app opens; typically in the didFinishLaunching event. Works only once per app version, does not have any effect if called again in the same app version.

Record an Install or an Update by determining if a previous version of this app is already installed on the user's device. To be used if this is the first version of the app or the previous version also included MAT sdk. To be called when an app opens; typically in the didFinishLaunching event. Works only once per app version, does not have any effect if called again in the same app version.

Parameter.Name: refId
Parameter.Abstract: A reference id used to track an install and/or update, corresponds to advertiserrefid on the website.

Token.Abstract: Instead of an Install, force an Update to be recorded. To be used if MAT sdk was not integrated in the previous version of this app. Only use this method if your app can distinguish between an install and an update, else use trackInstall. To be called when an app opens; typically in the didFinishLaunching event. Works only once per app version, does not have any effect if called again in the same app version.

Instead of an Install, force an Update to be recorded. To be used if MAT sdk was not integrated in the previous version of this app. Only use this method if your app can distinguish between an install and an update, else use trackInstallWithReferenceId. To be called when an app opens; typically in the didFinishLaunching event. Works only once per app version, does not have any effect if called again in the same app version.

Parameter.Name: refId
Parameter.Abstract: A reference id used to track an update, corresponds to advertiserrefid on the website.

Token.Abstract: Record a Track Action for an Event Id or Name.

Parameter.Name: eventIdOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The event name or event id.

Parameter.Name: isId
Parameter.Abstract: Yes if the event is an Id otherwise No if the event is a name only.

Token.Abstract: Record a Track Action for an Event Id or Name and reference id.

Parameter.Name: eventIdOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The event name or event id.

Parameter.Name: isId
Parameter.Abstract: Yes if the event is an Id otherwise No if the event is a name only.

Parameter.Name: refId
Parameter.Abstract: The referencId for an event, corresponds to advertiserrefid on the website.

Token.Abstract: Record a Track Action for an Event Id or Name, revenue and currency.

Parameter.Name: eventIdOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The event name or event id.

Parameter.Name: isId
Parameter.Abstract: Yes if the event is an Id otherwise No if the event is a name only.

Parameter.Name: revenueAmount
Parameter.Abstract: The revenue amount for the event.

Parameter.Name: currencyCode
Parameter.Abstract: The currency code override for the event. Blank defaults to sdk setting.

Token.Abstract: Record a Track Action for an Event Id or Name and reference id, revenue and currency.

Parameter.Name: eventIdOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The event name or event id.

Parameter.Name: isId
Parameter.Abstract: Yes if eventIdOrName is the event id for a pre-defined event on the MAT website, NO otherwise

Parameter.Name: refId
Parameter.Abstract: The referencId for an event, corresponds to advertiserrefid on the website.

Parameter.Name: revenueAmount
Parameter.Abstract: The revenue amount for the event.

Parameter.Name: currencyCode
Parameter.Abstract: The currency code override for the event. Blank defaults to sdk setting.

Token.Abstract: Record a Track Action for an Event Id or Name and a list of event items.

Parameter.Name: eventIdOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The event name or event id.

Parameter.Name: isId
Parameter.Abstract: Yes if the event is an Id otherwise No if the event is a name only.

Parameter.Name: eventItems
Parameter.Abstract: An array of MATEventItem objects

Token.Abstract: Record a Track Action for an Event Name or Id.

Parameter.Name: eventIdOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The event name or event id.

Parameter.Name: isId
Parameter.Abstract: Yes if the event is an Id otherwise No if the event is a name only.

Parameter.Name: eventItems
Parameter.Abstract: An array of MATEventItem objects

Parameter.Name: refId
Parameter.Abstract: The referencId for an event, corresponds to advertiserrefid on the website.

Token.Abstract: Record a Track Action for an Event Name or Id.

Parameter.Name: eventIdOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The event name or event id.

Parameter.Name: isId
Parameter.Abstract: Yes if the event is an Id otherwise No if the event is a name only.

Parameter.Name: eventItems
Parameter.Abstract: An array of MATEventItem objects

Parameter.Name: revenueAmount
Parameter.Abstract: The revenue amount for the event.

Parameter.Name: currencyCode
Parameter.Abstract: The currency code override for the event. Blank defaults to sdk setting.

Token.Abstract: Record a Track Action for an Event Name or Id.

Parameter.Name: eventIdOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The event name or event id.

Parameter.Name: isId
Parameter.Abstract: Yes if the event is an Id otherwise No if the event is a name only.

Parameter.Name: eventItems
Parameter.Abstract: An array of MATEventItem objects

Parameter.Name: refId
Parameter.Abstract: The referencId for an event, corresponds to advertiserrefid on the website.

Parameter.Name: revenueAmount
Parameter.Abstract: The revenue amount for the event.

Parameter.Name: currencyCode
Parameter.Abstract: The currency code override for the event. Blank defaults to sdk setting.

Token.Abstract: Record a Track Action for an Event Name or Id.

Parameter.Name: eventIdOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The event name or event id.

Parameter.Name: isId
Parameter.Abstract: Yes if the event is an Id otherwise No if the event is a name only.

Parameter.Name: eventItems
Parameter.Abstract: An array of MATEventItem objects

Parameter.Name: refId
Parameter.Abstract: The referencId for an event, corresponds to advertiserrefid on the website.

Parameter.Name: revenueAmount
Parameter.Abstract: The revenue amount for the event.

Parameter.Name: currencyCode
Parameter.Abstract: The currency code override for the event. Blank defaults to sdk setting.

Parameter.Name: transactionState
Parameter.Abstract: The in-app purchase transaction SKPaymentTransactionState as received from the iTunes store.

Token.Abstract: Record a Track Action for an Event Name or Id.
Token.Declaration: - (void)trackActionForEventIdOrName:(NSString *)eventIdOrName eventIsId:(BOOL)isId eventItems:(NSArray *)eventItems referenceId:(NSString *)refId revenueAmount:(float)revenueAmount currencyCode:(NSString *)currencyCode transactionState:(NSInteger)transactionState receipt:(NSData *)receipt

Parameter.Name: eventIdOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The event name or event id.

Parameter.Name: isId
Parameter.Abstract: Yes if the event is an Id otherwise No if the event is a name only.

Parameter.Name: eventItems
Parameter.Abstract: An array of MATEventItem objects

Parameter.Name: refId
Parameter.Abstract: The referencId for an event, corresponds to advertiserrefid on the website.

Parameter.Name: revenueAmount
Parameter.Abstract: The revenue amount for the event.

Parameter.Name: currencyCode
Parameter.Abstract: The currency code override for the event. Blank defaults to sdk setting.

Parameter.Name: transactionState
Parameter.Abstract: The in-app purchase transaction SKPaymentTransactionState as received from the iTunes store.

Parameter.Name: receipt
Parameter.Abstract: The in-app purchase transaction receipt as received from the iTunes store.

Token.Abstract: Sets whether or not to user cookie based tracking. Default: NO

Parameter.Name: yesorno
Parameter.Abstract: YES/NO for cookie based tracking.

Token.Abstract: Sets a url to be used with app-to-app tracking so that the sdk can open the download (redirect) url. This is used in conjunction with the setTracking:advertiserId:offerId:publisherId:redirect: method.

Parameter.Name: redirect_url
Parameter.Abstract: The string name for the url.

Token.Abstract: Start a Tracking Session on the MAT server.

Parameter.Name: targetAppPackageName
Parameter.Abstract: The bundle identifier of the target app.

Parameter.Name: targetAppAdvertiserId
Parameter.Abstract: The MAT advertiser id of the target app.

Parameter.Name: shouldRedirect
Parameter.Abstract: Should redirect to the download url if the tracking session was successfully created. See setRedirectUrl:.

Parameter.Name: publisherId
Parameter.Abstract: The MAT publisher id of the target app.

Parameter.Name: offerId
Parameter.Abstract: The MAT offer id of the target app.

Token.Abstract: Record the URL and Source when an application is opened via a URL scheme. This typically occurs during OAUTH or when an app exits and is returned to via a URL. The data will be sent to the HasOffers server so that a Re-Engagement can be recorded.

Parameter.Name: urlString
Parameter.Abstract: the url string used to open your app.

Parameter.Name: sourceApplication
Parameter.Abstract: the source used to open your app. For example, mobile safari.
